content.detailedDescription: I was in this hotel wit my girl i went to balcony to smoke a cigrate and start looking the sky was clear sky lots of star n look other side notice 5 or 6 dome looking lights in a started like one in top of another 1 gape in between 10 to 15 feet and start making shapes n moving so fast that a human things can't move that fast n went back to same form i try to record i had my iphone i couldn't see in it any thing properly i went in wit my girl n after an hour came back for smoke again see them tsee it was there i say people don't belive in this but this is so real n true after having this encounter i start to belive there is aliens
content.summary: Was in balcony of this hotel i see dome size objects bright in straight line then moving direct direction

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving to san diego on interstate 8 on july 1st, around 12 mid night we saw a very bright orange light that appeared, we knew it was different from airplanes and other lights that were around us b/c the color was so bright orange. one thing was weird the light kept dimming in and out, this was different from the rest of the lights that were around us at the time. the wind turbines have lights and their color and brightness nothing to do with what we saw. we kept an eye on it for about 5 minutes, kept appearing and disappearing. we noticed that before it vanished the light swirled and it was gone. we kept looking around us since there was nothing but desert. we couldn't find anything similar to what we saw. this happened on interstate 8 right before you get to the wind turbines this thing was on top of the mountain it seemed too low for an airplane and too different from the rest of the wind turbines.
content.summary: Brigh orange light right above mountains next to windmills on interstate 8

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in our backyard watching the fireworks when i saw two light in the sky to the west. one brighter then the other and not moving. they sat motionless for about 15-20min and slowly moved off to the northwest. there was no blinking lights like on a airplane and it was a cloudy night so you could not see any stars. after arguing with my wife about it for 20 min they disappeared. she maintains the belief this was some sort of light show.
content.summary: Seemed to stay in one spot for 20 min then slowly started moving northwest

content.detailedDescription: I was on holiday in the philippines when i was woken early around 6 or 7 am local time. i heard the sound of a helicopter very loud so i went out of my room to take a peak, i saw a helicopter very low so i got my iphone and started recording because the helicopter kept coming down over the sea where people was swimming and i thought it was dangerous flying. i didnt notice anything else at the time or see any object. later when i reviewed the footage i noticed a fast movement of something across the screen so i slowed the footage down to look and sure enough there is an object there, after this i reviewed all the footage frame by frame and was schocked because at the start the helicopter goes past a boat and for 2 frames an objeck flies so fast and close to the helicopter. then as the helicopter ascends upwards you can see a translucent object come from behind the clouds and moves fast with strange movement then if flies offscreen and then a second later the object apears solid and moving past the helicopter very fast, this continues a few times and then its gone again. i still have the origanal footage on my iphone. you really have to look frame by frame to see what the object is doing. i got the feeling watching it that it was curious about the helicopter and observing what was happening.At the time maybe there was about 30 people watching but no one noticed the object because it moved so fast that the eye couldnt see it. i have taken screen shots of the video and enlarged it so you can see what it looks like also i will attach the video in real time.
content.summary: Drone like

content.detailedDescription: From sarah palin's house came a ufo made of light. it landed on my foot and vaporized me, then returned to her house. when my ghost visited the site, it burned into the ground: "suck it putin, i will rule the world, all righty!" i am typing this from beyond the grave, and i am going to sue the aliens who are definitely mysterious and not from alaska.
content.summary: I died

content.detailedDescription: I was very young when i first came into contact with a ufo. i do not know how old i was at the time but i would say between the age of 5 and 10 thus making the year of the sighting between the years 2000 and 2005. it was a dark summer night and i was outside in my backyard with my two older brothers. i was jumping on my trampoline while my brothers were sitting on the patio 20 feet away from me. as i jumped on the trampoline i would always look towards these two very tall cell phone towers that were a few miles away from my house. the two towers were the kind of towers that were held up by long cables and have no internal structure so they are basically transparent. as i was jumping i felt this need to look towards those towers. when i looked toward the towers i saw something that i cannot explain, but still remember many years later. i saw a craft that was hovering ever so silently. this craft was like none i have ever seen before. it was huge. probably larger than an commercial airliner i would say. it was shaped like a cigar and had curved edges with no points. it was metallic like a dull chrome. what really caught my eye was the blue inscriptions on the side of the craft that was facing me. the inscriptions glowed a rich royal blue color and it seemed to be some form of pattern that resembled a snake without curves but instead sharp 90 degree angles. i stared at this craft for around 10 seconds. i felt this weird connection to it. like some sort of trance was but onto me and nothing else mattered. nothing else i noticed except for me and the craft. i felt this feeling run through my body as if it was trying to communicate with me. it felt like electricity almost and i couldn't look away. for those 10 seconds i stared at it until my brothers started yelling at me to look up into the sky, and that is when a black stealth fighter plane flew over my house at a very low altitude. it flew so low that the who neighborhood shook. once the plane past overhead i looked back up to the towers and the craft was gone without a trace. i asked my brothers if they noticed the ufo that i saw and they said they had no idea what i was talking about and told me i was seeing things that didn't exist. yes i was a kid when i saw this ufo but i remember what i saw very clearly and i will never forget the feeling i felt from it. it changed my whole outlook on life.
content.summary: I saw a metallic ufo with bright blue inscriptions

content.detailedDescription: I am not certain about the date, but this happened in the of summer 1992. my boyfriend in high school was in a band and they practiced in the 9th ward, new orleans. the band had a gig in gretna, la on a saturday night. we all had a great time and shut the place down. now it is about 6am sunday morning; a band member, my boyfriend and myself drove to the 9th ward to pick up the equipment at the band member's house. the three of us joked about,'how did we get to be the only ones to pick up the equipment at 7:20 in the morning!'. the joking went on as we finished up and we departed. my boyfriend and i had about a 25 minute drive to marrero, with no traffic and taking the westbank expressway hi-rise. even with traffic, i could make that run, knowing shortcuts, ok. when we got to the other side of the g.N.O. bridge, i saw a shpere hovering over the tree line and was behind a cruise ship that was coming around the bend. i said, "is that the sun? no it can't be. what is it?". my boyfriend says, "oh that's the sun.". i was already going through the process of elimination, and i see the sun to the east and said, "no! that is the sun! this thing is facing south.". the sphere looked bronze/golden color, the height was as big as two maybe three cruise ships stacked on top of each other, but not as wide. it might be able to fit in the super dome, on the field. of course, i am still driving at this point, slowed down a little bit, when i first saw it, but not much. as we are pondering this sighting, i am thinking of going to where we can observe it, but got nervous. we are on the w.B.Hi-rise and i take the first exit to get to ground level. i just did not want to be where it can see us, i do not know why. i felt a little frightened. we said that we would not tell anyone. we get home, as we are coming inside, his dad is going out to look for us. his dad said, "there ya'll are! i was coming to look for you". we said, "why?!". dad said, "b/c it is 11 o'clock! ya'll are never this late, the morning after a gig". although i drove the ground level to get home, after the sighting; it should not have taken that long to get home. i timed that run many, many times after that and even w/traffic, it does not take 3.5 hours to drive from st. claude bridge to ames and laplaco blvd. we did tell our parents and close friends, and till this day do not know what happen in the time we lost. i never saw anything like that again. i always wonder if anyone saw it that day.
content.summary: A sphere hovering over the miss. river, following a cruise ship, in summer 1992.

content.detailedDescription: I thought the best way to film a ufo was to film normal air activity whenever possible.  i filmed a helicopter going north, then moved to a chemtrail, which was faint. a black orb appeared and disappeared, i later found when looking for the chemtrail in the film.  i think i may have seen it while filming, don't know, a lot was going on at the time. after filming the orb, the helicopter returned, but this time heading south.  i filmed the helicopter as well.
content.summary: Was filming chemtrail when a black orb appeared then disappeared. helicopter was flying around at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
It was just before the 4th of july holiday. i was 13 years old. i clearly remember the time frame because some of the other witnesses had fireworks they planned on setting off.
there was a group of around 10 kids. we had several camping and partying spots in the wooded area nearby my home. we would often spend time there building fires, cooking hotdogs and other stuff teens did. we had a large fire going i remember that.
someone (don't remember who) spotted a very bright light off to the north in the same woods. as there were rival "gangs" of teens in the area that also partied in the same woods, we figured that there was another party going on. we had also built a nice fort in that area we used in the winter, and someone mentioned that maybe someone was burning down our fort (that's how bright the light was suddenly)
myself and perhaps 4 others (i do have the names of most of the others, but as recently as 2010 when i ran into one of them and mentioned the event, they became quite upset and didn't want to discuss, so i am doubtful they would come fwd) got up from our seats and hiked towards the light.
as we got closer it suddenly became apparent that the light was a spherical object floating around just under treetop level (perhaps 40 feet up). it was round, but far to bright to look at directly. i remember seeing shades of violet and gold flashing in the mix. if you placed your hand up to block the light, and peered between your fingers you could make out the spherical shape.
i remember yelling out "what in the hell is that"?
one friend brian at the same time started screaming and yelling that they were going to take us. he took off through the woods back in the opposite direction (later we found out he went home to get his dad)
several other at the same time also broke down and started sobbing. i was not the oldest there. the two that really freaked out were older than me...Perhaps 16 at the time.
only one stayed with me trying to get closer to the light.
as we did, it began wobbling and humming loudly and started moving right towards us, dropping down near the ground.
we (of course) ran off away from it. after maybe running 100 yards and stopping to take a break, i looked back and saw that the sphere was once again heading back in the other direction, now kind of dipping and bobbing as it weaved it's way between large trees.
the same thing continued on for another full 30-45 minutes (i think)
we moved towards it, it turned towards us. we turn away and it turned away. it no doubt was responding to us. during this time, several of the kids that were back at the fire and saw the kids running and screaming away, came to join us out of curiosity i am sure.
one of them was the oldest in the group (brian's older brother) and after standing near the light (maybe 50 yards away) he also began babbling nonsense about being taken and began crying uncontrollably. all this of course was pretty traumatic to me, a 13 yr old.
then i heard brian (who had returned with his father, and their house was a good half mile from our spot in the woods) yelling at us to get away from the object. when we ran back to him and saw he had his dad with him we all kind of expected some kind of sense to be made, as we now had an adult with us!
his dad stood there slack-jawed, himself just muttering some nonesense. then the object got much brighter, like it was going to explode...Amd shot off fast through the trees.
we all ran after it. (including brian's dad)
it came out of the woods into a clearing from an old abandoned apple orchard, where we could all finally see the night sky.
the object wobbled around maybe 100 ft off the ground and again grew brighter. then, it shot off at perhaps a 45% angle up into the night sky and then stopped dead in the sky. we all saw it sitting there (at this time there was only four people. me mike, brian and brian's dad)
it was far brighter than a star now, and perhaps the size of a dime held at arm's length.
then, there was a flash and it broke into two objects. the bright white half shot straight up into the sky leaving a streak.
the other part, red, fluttered down slowly beyond the horizon, with a path looking like a leaf falling down from a tree.
brian's dad did call the cuyahoga falls police to report it when we went home.
they admitted they had other reports of odd lights, but said "what do you want us to do about it?"

it has bothered me for years not reporting this. 

my parents have had a close encounter years earlier(ufo hovered over their car, car stalled, etc) and my father won't barely admit anything happened. my mother (now deceased) was quite upset. years later when communion was released, she became obsessed with ufos and abductions and told me the cover of streiber's book scared the hell out of her and she had to buy it.

i also years later had another encounter while fishing at night with a friend. i have details on that as well...And recently spoke to that friend and he only remembers the bright flash when the object left from hovering over our small boat. i recall more than just the flash. i recall the beam illuminating the boat. i remember both us us looking up and seeing the bottom of something large above us and then there was a flash as it basically just disappeared!

i am willing to discuss this is person if desired. the events described above have led me on a very strange journey in my 55 years of life. i have an immense library of ufo literature. i spend a lot of time star gazing. i rally would like to someday understand better this event.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Incredibly bright sphere. pulsated, flashed at times. hard to look at, 5-10 ft diameter

content.detailedDescription: I live in a wooded area , at 4:30am i take out my dog after 10 min. i heard a jet ,i watch it go out of sight . all is quiet, then i notice a long 1-2 second flash of light coming from the nw moving slow it would then become a dull redish color that could hardly be seen for 1-2 seconds then a long bright white strobe again this was not a aviation strobe that is a fast flash. this passed directly over me and exited to the south east this had no sound and moved to slow for an aircraft.  my feelings was filled with happiness.
content.summary: High up,dull red then long strobe of very bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed after going to sleep for just a second when i woke up feeling a burning pain in my left thigh. 2 years later in seattle, wa i saw a grey alien in a ptsd flash back. i heard buzz-saw cutting; i was vibrating; and i was screaming in shock but there was no pain. as i awoke from the flashback my left hip had the same feeling as it did in 2009 and now i am having vericose veins growing in that area. i know what i experienced was real, but i don't remember much of it other than what i'm telling you now. the alien had big black eyes, a large oblong, conical head; two holes for nostrils and a small slit for a mouth. it was greyish-silver in color.
content.summary: Alien opeation on hip

content.detailedDescription:
So around 9:30pm  september 2013 my girl friend, her brother and i decided to go to taco bell for dinner. as we left her house, we came up to the round about, i was sitting in the back of her blazer. i looked into the sky just over the tree line, their i noticed 4 red or amber lights in a horizontal line. all 4 lights was evenly spaced out. i then shouted to my girl friend to go left and stay on pfe, it's this little back road near are house. as we continued down pfe road the 4 lights that i saw just moments ago was now 7 light in a horizontal line, but now i'm not the only one viewing it, my girl friend then stops the car and we sit on the side of the road watching. her brother just kept asking what are those lights doing, what are they but me and my girl had no answer for him. as we continue watching thing just got strange, the 7 lights we was viewing started making shapes in the sky. they started out horizontal all spaced out evenly right above the tree line, then in a blink of an eye they were all vertical straight line still evenly spaced out, they did 4 more shaps that i would have to draw out but i rember them clear as day. anyways after all the shapes they did one by one each light disaperd. it reminded me of a dim switch, the lights would slowly get dimmer till it was gone. well after witnessing this the 3 of was scared but we continued to taco bell to get our dinner, as we got there and drove into the line, i looked up again and to my amazement i see the same colored lights but this time only 3 and it's in a triangle formation. so i hop out the blazer and point to the sky and other people look up and see what i'm seeing. this object was moving so slow with no sound what so ever. and i wanna say that if this triangle was a solid object then it was huge, i mean big big big. well anyways as we watch this thing fly over us i noticed a blinking light from the corner of my eye, it was a small plane heading straight for us. now mind you i can hear this plane lol not the object. then as the plane makes its way over us its now under this object. and like i said before this object was big, when we watch this plane fly past it looked like a little toy compared to the object. but as the plane was passing, the lights disappeared just like before, just dimmed out and it was gone. me my girl and her brother was confused by all this. we did not know what to think, we did agree on one thing, what we saw couldn't have man made. with how fast they moved and the creepiness and dead silence.

 another thing to note is that 2 months after this sighting me and my girlfriend saw the same type of lights again but it was only 2 and they was flying very low and fast coming right at us then suddenly took a shap right and disappeared. then 4 months after that i'm with my little brother heading to winco, grocery store. we park i and get out and for some reason i just looked up and saw over 2 dozen lights and i yield out to my brother because he was still in the car. he then gets out and we both started watching these lights dance around in the sky and other people in the parking lot was looking at us because i was pointing at the sky the whole time and this lasted mybe 2 or 3 mins before they all disapeard.
content.summary: Saw lights making strange shapes in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Several friends were over my house to welcome a visitor from out of town. was a quiet evening. we had been playing cards and i was getting tired so i sat the hand out. i went to sit buy a window because he house will filled with cigarette smoke. as i did, i heard a unusual noise coming from outside loud enough to draw attention from everyone else. thought i saw lights. they were low. i thought maybe a plane was in trouble so i said "oh crap: and ran out the front door. everyone else followed me. first looking up just above the trees, we felt the warmth of something blowing air downward. couldn't see the craft as first, but thought we were seeing multiple helicopters when actually, it was a huge tri shape
 thing with bottom lights, all standing in the middle if the street realized we were looking at stars in the sky through the tri shaped craft. it passed at a pace of less than half a mile a second. after it had passed and disappeared, we went inside and all agreed to never speak of it, i haven't until now. haven't spoken to any of those either.
content.summary: Large tri-shaped craft sighted

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in my truck during my lunch hour to get some shut eye outside of my job here in katy, there is a lot of flat farm land out here and it was very hot outside. 
as i was waking up from my nap, i looked out of the front of my windshield to see a strange square/cubed-like object floating in the sky, it looked dark grey. 
then all of a sudden it looked as if it was taking off west but disappeared before i could get a better look at it. 
i found this very strange, i called my girlfriend to tell her.
content.summary: Looked up and saw a square shapped craft hoovering in the sky, only to take off in the blink of an eye.

content.detailedDescription:
So it was a pleasant evening and i was just standing in my balcony talking to my girlfriend i was just looking at the stars it was a clear dark sky. it was a no moon light with a beautiful sky. i suddenly saw a orangish-red i knew exactly knew what it was. it was a ufo. i could tell because i am a researcher on this topic for a long time now because of an incident that happened with me when i was 9.I love to research on aliens and ufo's. so that thing was around the corner of my building and then it came hovering in the front and that thing was like 800 ft above my head it was scary cause once it came above my head it stopped i kept on observing it. my phone started fluctuating it's signal strength and it was like i went through time loop . why i am saying this because when i saw the duration of the call it was 14 mins bt after i stared observing the ufo  when i checked my phone again it showed 25 mins my gf was shouting "hello??? hello are there??? hello???" i said i didn't go anywhere it felt like seconds bt about 10 mins had passed by!!! i cut the phone call call and quickly clicked a pic of the ufo. it started to hover once again this time towards east . it was hovering at at a very slow speed no helicopter or plane could do that. it disappeared for 2-3 mins. it once again came in the front stopped for 3 mins approx. and then suddenly it it went up in the sky with a blink of an eye. i know that i'm reporting this really late bt i found the mufon site a little late. i have     
all their episodes on history tv 18. after this incident there have been 4 more sightings around my area. just after the incident a plane flied the same path of departure of that ufo that was in my guesses was tracking of an ufo's activicties thereafter. thank you for reading.
content.summary: I don't why but i think that ufo was observing me

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting on my front porch waiting for my wife to return from store and help her unload the car, i looked up to the northeast and saw a diamond-square object slowly rotating and slowly floating in the sky. at first, i thought it was a balloon of some sort, but as it rotated, the sides of the object flexed in and out in a pulsing manner. i also realized it wasn't a balloon, and was much larger than one when i saw it pass behind a line of trees, which are approximately 300-500 yards away - it seemed to be both much larger than a balloon that could have been randomly lost from a holiday event. 
the object was still rotating as it disappeared behind the upper edge of the tree line, and i unfortunately had no way of moving quickly enough to try and see where it went. the daylight was also quickly fading, so it would have been a more-than-likely fruitless effort.
content.summary: Floating square ufo

content.detailedDescription: The craft casted a light in my room then they came through the wall and one stood at the foot of my bed it communicated to me that i should go back to sleep i closed my eyes but i opened them up again and there it was standing over me then it vanished i don't remember anything after it told me to close my eyes only that i opened them up a few second after it told me to go to sleep...... it seemed so real to this day i sometimes think it was all just a dream i have no evidence of the incident just my word
content.summary: Saw three or four grays in my bedroom

content.detailedDescription: I was outside when i saw these small lights pulsating . they scared me because they were so close to my house. there was quite a few of these small objects hovering over he lake that i live right next to then started heading towards my house . these were not drones or helicopters and they were the size of a softball i have this filmed on my phone and i am scared now they they will come back ..
content.summary: Several small round like objects with pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving southbound on highway 56 in binbrook (just outside hamilton) i noticed a circular shape moving quickly through the sky. it was orange/yellow in colour and did not change in appearance nor leave any trace. at times it almost looked like a perfect ball of fire. 

i pulled into the nearby tim hortens to get a better look. it was then the object appeared to come to a stop. i was able to gauge this by using the tree line. the object then turned direction completely heading northbound at a quick pace. again the object remained unchanged and appeared to move effortlessly through the sky. 

the object remained a great distance away from me the entire time. there is an airport in the area but a plane is usually obvious by the blinking lights. being that the airport is nearby planes usually fly at a relatively low altitude, where this object was quite high. 

once the object change direction i began to realize the extremely perculiar nature off the object. it was then i attempted to follow. unfortunately the speed of the object the my obstructed view from the tree line prohibited any further observance.
content.summary: Wondering if anyone else saw something similar?

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the 15 freeway south through lake elsinore and saw (very clearly) three balls of light hovering over a nearby mountain/hill. my mom and i thought it was strange so we kept watching and the three lights zapped back together into one and then split apart again and at one point moved up and down and side to side way faster than any man made air craft would be capable of and it was most definitely not anything "night sky divers" would be capable of doing like the newspapers reported a day or two later. i've been sky diving before and you can't exactly zip back on up and side to side once you're in the air lol. they eventually zapped back together and flew in a curve up and behind the mountain/hill. my mom and i had never put much thought into aliens or ufos before but when that happened, we just knew instantly that it was definitely not anything from our planet. also, since we saw that we have both repeatedly experienced sleep paralysis. it's not fun.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving with my mom and saw them over the lake/mountains.

content.detailedDescription: Circa 6/1961 i was stationed at bunker hill afb,sac, now grissom arb, b-58s,kc-135s,b-47s,on alert. on the christmas tree alert area about 0300 hrs. i was walking around assigned aircraft, 3 kc-135s, looked up and observed a cigar shaped ufo very high. looked like sun in e glowing on bottom. still dark on ground. then three or more disk shaped ufos, glowing white, exited the cigar shaped ufo and flew w and out of sight. there were two f-106s on alert. several calls went to security control and base ops. the f-106s took off. no further info. disk returned to mother ship and reentered. then the cigar shaped ufo left e bound & out of sight. about 25 security police on the flight line were amazed & baffled.
content.summary: Cigar shaped very high, three +? disk exit and leave to w, return up to an hour later, reenter, cigar leaves, out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside our home on our patio around 11:00pm when i 
noticed 2 bright red/orange orbs travelling from south to north and  located just off to our west. as i implored my wife to stand up & observe the strange sight above us, a third orb appeared, which was travelling in the same direction as the other 2 but appeared lower to the ground. the 2  northern most orbs were flying in close formation with one above & just to the south of the other. all 3 objects seemed to travel at the same speed. they began to curve in a ne direction before we lost them behind several large trees. their colors were uniform & extremely bright.
content.summary: Three(3)  red-orange orbs over s/sw austin tx

content.detailedDescription:
I was a child of nine or ten. i was laying down staring at the clouds. i had a strange feeling, jumped up and started up the road. i saw what i thought was a blimp. then it shot up in the air in a diagonal direction and moved in angles. i was staring. i remember thinking that planes, helicopters and blimps didn't move like this. nor did toys. i felt like it saw me. i was frozen in the middle of the road. it shot towards me and i could see how big it was. i remember lights around it. i was terrified. i found my feet and ran to my house. i tried to get my older brother off the phone to come and look. by the time he did it was gone.
after this i had trouble sleeping. for years i would wake to sounds of talking and bright lights. i would dream that i heard a flute and would follow it into the forest. when i would wake i would have dirt and leaves and twigs. my mom found marks on me and was upset.
i have told some family and friends about this. i guess i'm doing this now because i would like to know if anyone else saw this when i did. i'm questioning my memories. i never saw things that weren't there as a child or now. 
for awhile i couldn't wear watches. tv's would turn on and off. 
i watched something and the anxiety came back. i'm hoping this will help. 
i'm not afraid like i was for years.
content.summary: I had a strange feeling. walked up the street and watched what i thought was a blimp. it moved fast at angles then towards me

content.detailedDescription: I was pregnant with my son in my first trimester and i had complications so the doctor told me i had to have bed rest for the duration of my pregnancy. i was actually bleeding. every thing else was normal except for i kept waking up and not being able to move or talk. i was very terrified. it happened for a few weeks but the last time it happened i saw what looked a little old man about three feet in hight scooting across the floor. i coulden't move not a muscle except for my eyes. another weird thing is my room stays totally dark at all times but for some reson i could see him perfectly in the light. he left and then i was able to move again. ever since i stopped bleeding and carried to full term. i also started getting really curious about astro physics and that whole year started watching alot of the science chanel. my son is ten now but he has had simular experiences.
content.summary: I just saw the being and i coulden't scream or move. it looked like a really short old man.

content.detailedDescription:
1. about to leave my gf house. 
2. just looked up because i always do just incase i see something interesting. 
3. just noticed a moving start that was travelling really fast which i thought it could be a satellite. i just thought it was weird that there was two satellites in the same path fairly close to the other.  
noticed a third star move in a east direction. 
just really high up couldn't make out  the shape.
i was excited to see if there was any satellites flying over top on line or planes and couldn't see anything online about a satellite or a plane flying overhead. 
6. i could see it in a ne direction but it was almost too far north east to watch any longer. tried to record with iphone  but it couldn't pick up the light.
content.summary: I was leaving my girlfriends house and noticed a moving star then i saw another following  the other star in the same direction ne direction . then noticed the third moving to the east. very high up. t

content.detailedDescription: While taking pictures on our patio i caught this bright object with the camera. i did not notice the object at the time.
content.summary: Only caught by camera

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette on my back porch in burnsville. i looked slightly to my left and saw what i thought to be a planet with how bright it was. observed for a moment, then turned to step inside and ask my fiance to get a star map app. when we returned with one it was gone! i honestly thought it was a plabet, it only hovered and sat there. i really only noticed it due to the odd rosy gold color of the light so assumed it to be venus when i first saw it.
content.summary: Bright ball of light, thought was planet. went back w/ star map, was gone

content.detailedDescription: I was in my shower getting ready for work . i saw a large ball of light coming tordes my house . and turned off my shower to see if it made any noise . i did not have a fan on . it was silent . the object made no noise what so ever and was low moving to the west . i saw a bright light shine over my backyard . the light was so bright i could not make out what kind of craft it was .
content.summary: In my shower with wibow opened , saw a large light from the east turned off shower no fan on.

content.detailedDescription:
July 4, 2015
my wife and i viewed groups of unusual red lights moving across the night sky over novi, mi and other areas of metro detroit on july 4, 2015. the sky was clear and the temperature around 78 degrees with the usual stars in the sky very clear and visible.  no planes overhead either.  the neighbors were firing off fireworks as usual for the fourth of july holiday.
our aunt who lives in westland, about 8 miles south of us called at 10:17 pm on july 4, 2015 saying she was seeing strange red lights in the north sky moving slowly and methodically from west to east.  so we went outside and looked into the south-southwest sky and saw a strange looking red light in the form of an orb or circle moving slowly across the sky from west to the east.  then about 6 more started appearing, one at a time, in the same sky moving from west to east.  they moved slowly and then eventually formed a c like formation but about 3 minutes later they moved into a j like formation.  after another few minutes the lights started to move towards each other and then started fading two lights into one.  each of the six lights in turn moved to the next highest in the sky and the two became one and then the next one left doing the same thing fading into the next highest red light until there was only one red light left.  when there was only one red orb left it slowly faded away without any sound or exhaust.  i even used binoculars but they just appeared to be a bright red light.  they did not have any shape like a plane or helicopter and there was no sound coming from these red orbs.
after this first group faded out or basically travelled to the east out of sight we went onto our back deck and observed more of the same in the north sky.  the exact same thing happened that we observed in the front yard.  one at a time, travelling from west to east they were bright red until eventually forming another c formation that eventually morphed into a j like formation in the north-northeast sky.  after a couple of minutes one at a time they started flying slowly into the highest light and each in turn disappeared into it.  when only the one red light was left, it slowly faded away and then nothing else was seen in the sky anywhere.  after the fireworks were finished by 11 pm the red orbs had stopped showing up.  it seemed like the red orbs were somehow trying to react to the fireworks going off in the sky.  but the red orbs were much higher in the sky then any fireworks that were fired into the sky.  the red orbs by the way they were moving must have been under some kind of intelligent guidance.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orbs traveling west to east and then hovering in c and j shape formations
